ovdesc.p: This system maintained table holds the definition of the rule itself. This will be written out each time the GUI rule table is saved.

desc.p: Index of all versions associated with this table. Each day that a rule version is changed, this is added to this list.
This field will be used by the rules interface to identify which versions of rules should be passed to/referenced in the rules engine.
Full description of rule. Text box creates a space for full description/explanation, with further explanation of changes to rule. Used in top panel of description pane
Unique identifier of rule. Will be specified in a rule if the rule always uses the most recent version.
Shorter description. Used as enrichment when listing rules or in Enquiry screens
